name: LaughLab | Satenra Kumar Parteti
description:
The 'LaughLab' Chrome extension, masterfully crafted by Satendra Kumar Parteti, offers a treasure trove of witty and amusing jokes to lighten any mood and spark laughter.

• Special acknowledgment goes to Sven Fehler for his adept API integration, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable browsing experience.

•(Credits: Extension Creator: Satendra Kumar Parteti [GitHub: https://github.com/satendra03], API Integration: Sven Fehler [GitHub: https://github.com/Sv443])
author: Satendra Kumar Parteti
